resources:
mkdir @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_contigs_fixed makeFastaFile --input_dir @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_contigs/Tcruzi_contigs --output_fasta @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_contigs_fixed/Tcruzi.fasta --output_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_contigs_fixed/Tcruzi.gff --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --ncbiTaxId 353153 --externalDatabaseVersion %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --sequenceFile @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_contigs_fixed/Tcruzi.fasta --SOTermName 'contig' --regexSourceId '>(\S+)' --tableName "DoTS::ExternalNASequence" Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. preprocessGFF3 --input_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_contigs_fixed/Tcruzi.gff --output_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_Annotation/Tcruzi_fixed.gff --extDbName %EXT_DB_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --mapFile @gusHome@/lib/xml/isf/TriTrypDB/sangerGFF32Gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_Annotation/Tcruzi_fixed.gff --fileFormat gff3 --soCvsVersion @soVer@ --defaultOrganism "Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener" --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence --seqIdColumn source_id --validationLog @pipelineDir@/logs/Tcruzi.validation.log --bioperlTreeOutput @pipelineDir@/logs/Tcruzi.bioperl --handlerExternalDbs "enzyme:enzymeDB:2009-08-12" Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. mkdir @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed makeFastaFile --input_dir @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes/Tcruzi_chromosomes --output_fasta @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi.fasta --output_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi.gff grep "-S[[:space:]]" @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi.gff > @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi_Esmeraldo.gff grep -v "-S[[:space:]]" @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi.gff > @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi_NonEsmeraldo.gff grep -A 1 "-S[[:space:]]" @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi.fasta > @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi_Esmeraldo.fasta grep -A 1 "-P[[:space:]]" @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi.fasta > @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi_NonEsmeraldo.fasta --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --ncbiTaxonName "Trypanosoma cruzi strain NonEsmeraldo" --externalDatabaseVersion %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --sequenceFile @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi_NonEsmeraldo.fasta --SOTermName 'chromosome' --regexSourceId '>(\S+)' --tableName "DoTS::ExternalNASequence" Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. preprocessGFF3 --input_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi_NonEsmeraldo.gff --output_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_Annotation_Chromosomes/Tcruzi_fixed.gff --extDbName %EXT_DB_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --mapFile @gusHome@/lib/xml/isf/TriTrypDB/sangerGFF32Gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_Annotation_Chromosomes/Tcruzi_fixed.gff --fileFormat gff3 --soCvsVersion @soVer@ --defaultOrganism "Trypanosoma cruzi strain NonEsmeraldo" --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence --seqIdColumn source_id --validationLog @pipelineDir@/logs/Tcruzi.validation.log.2 --bioperlTreeOutput @pipelineDir@/logs/Tcruzi.bioperl.2 --handlerExternalDbs "enzyme:enzymeDB:2009-08-12" This resource includes chromosome and unassigned contig sequences and annotations for the non-Esmeraldo haplotype of the sequenced Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener. Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --ncbiTaxId 366581 --externalDatabaseVersion %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --sequenceFile @downloadDir@/T.cruziEsmeraldo_chromosomes/Tcruzi_Esmeraldo.fasta --SOTermName 'chromosome' --regexSourceId '>(\S+)' --tableName "DoTS::ExternalNASequence" Genome sequences and annotations for T.cruzi strain CL Brener were obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute Sequencing and annotation of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. Mapping of gene coordinates from contigs to chromosomes for T. cruzi was generated by Rick Tarleton's group at the University of Georgia, Atehns, Georgia. The Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases, University of Georgia, Athens, GA. References: The genome sequence of Trypanosoma cruzi, etiologic agent of Chagas disease. Science 2005 Jul 15;309(5733):409-15 El-Sayed et al. Chromosome level assembly of the hybrid Trypanosoma cruzi genome.BMC Genomics. 2009 Jun 1;10:255. preprocessGFF3 --input_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruziNonEsmeraldo_chromosomes_fixed/Tcruzi_Esmeraldo.gff --output_gff @downloadDir@/T.cruziEsmeraldo_Annotation_Chromosomes/Tcruzi_fixed.gff --extDbName %EXT_DB_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --mapFile @gusHome@/lib/xml/isf/TriTrypDB/sangerGFF32Gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @downloadDir@/T.cruziEsmeraldo_Annotation_Chromosomes/Tcruzi_fixed.gff --fileFormat gff3 --soCvsVersion @soVer@ --defaultOrganism "Trypanosoma cruzi strain Esmeraldo" --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence --seqIdColumn source_id --validationLog @pipelineDir@/logs/Tcruzi.validation.log.2 --bioperlTreeOutput @pipelineDir@/logs/Tcruzi.bioperl.2 --handlerExternalDbs "enzyme:enzymeDB:2009-08-12" This resource includes chromosome sequences and annotations for the Esmeraldo haplotype of the sequenced Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener. Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --ncbiTaxId 5693 --externalDatabaseVersion %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --sequenceFile @downloadDir@/T.cruzi_Unassigned_Contigs/unassigned_contigs_1-14-2010.fasta --SOTermName 'contig' --regexSourceId '>(\S+)' --tableName "DoTS::ExternalNASequence" Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --ncbiTaxId 366581 --externalDatabaseVersion %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --sequenceFile @downloadDir@/TcruziEsmeraldo_scaffolds/T_cruzi.scf.fasta --SOTermName 'supercontig' --regexSourceId '>(\S+)' --tableName "DoTS::ExternalNASequence" Scaffold sequences for T.cruzi Esmeraldo version 6.0 from WUSTL --externalDatabaseSpec "%EXT_DB_NAME%|%EXT_DB_RLS_VER%" --inputFile @downloadDir@/GOAssociations_Tcruzi/Tcruzi.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "Gene Ontology|1.748" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @pipelineDir@/logs/badGOTerms.log T. cruzi Gene Ontology associations from GeneDB. getSubTaxa --ncbiTaxId 5693 --outputFile @@dataDir@@/taxonIdFile createPropFile --file @@dataDir@@/dbest.prop --propList "dbestLogin:@@dbestLogin@@,dbestPswd:@@dbestPswd@@" --span 500 --taxonFile @@dataDir@@/taxonIdFile --extDbName %RESOURCE_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %RESOURCE_VERSION% --soVer @@SO_VER@@ --dbestLoginFile @@dataDir@@/dbest.prop --dbestConnect @@dbestConnect@@ TriTryp ESTs from dbEST. --externalDatabaseName %RESOURCE_NAME% --externalDatabaseVersion %RESOURCE_VERSION% --ncbiTaxId 353153 --sequenceFile @@dataDir@@/chori105_bac.fasta --soTermName "clone_insert_end" --regexSourceId "^>gi\\|\\d+\\|gb\\|DX\\S+\\|DX\\d+\\s(CHORI105\\S+)\\s" -tableName "DoTS::ExternalNASequence" T. cruzi (CHORI105) BAC end-sequences were provided by Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and TIGR. --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Amastigote.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage 'Amastigote' Protein expression evidence from different stages (Amastigote, Epimastigote, Metacyclic, Trypomastigote) of T. cruzi provided by Rick Tarleton's group at the University of Georgia, Atehns, Georgia. The Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases, University of Georgia, Athens, GA --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Epimastigote.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage 'Epimastigote' Protein expression evidence from different stages (Amastigote, Epimastigote, Metacyclic, Trypomastigote) of T. cruzi provided by Rick Tarleton's group at the University of Georgia, Atehns, Georgia. The Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases, University of Georgia, Athens, GA --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Metacyclic.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage 'Metacyclic' Protein expression evidence from different stages (Amastigote, Epimastigote, Metacyclic, Trypomastigote) of T. cruzi provided by Rick Tarleton's group at the University of Georgia, Atehns, Georgia. The Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases, University of Georgia, Athens, GA --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Trypomastigote.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage 'Trypomastigote' Protein expression evidence from different stages (Amastigote, Epimastigote, Metacyclic, Trypomastigote) of T. cruzi provided by Rick Tarleton's group at the University of Georgia, Atehns, Georgia. The Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases, University of Georgia, Athens, GA --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Epimastigote_LTQXL.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage '' Proteomic Analysis of Detergent-Solubilized Membrane Proteins from Insect-Developmental Forms of T. cruzi (Cordero et. al.). Data was provided by Igor C. Almeida, Department of Biological Sciences, The Border Biomedical Research Center, University of Texas at El Paso, and Jose Franco da Silveira, Departamento de Microbiologia, Imunologia e Parasitologia, Escola Paulista de Medicina, UNIFESP. --inputFile @@dataDir@@/B1TU_NCBI20080317.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage '' Subcellular proteomics of T. cruzi reservosomes provided by Igor C. Almeida, Department of Biological Sciences, The Border Biomedical Research Center, University of Texas at El Paso, and Narcisa Cunha-e-Silva, Laboratório de Ultraestrutura Celular Hertha Meyer, Instituto de Biofísica Carlos Chagas Filho, Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. --inputFile @@dataDir@@/B1TG_NCBI20080317.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage '' Subcellular proteomics of T. cruzi reservosomes provided by Igor C. Almeida, Department of Biological Sciences, The Border Biomedical Research Center, University of Texas at El Paso, and Narcisa Cunha-e-Silva, Laboratório de Ultraestrutura Celular Hertha Meyer, Instituto de Biofísica Carlos Chagas Filho, Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. --inputFile @@dataDir@@/B1MTU_NCBI20080317.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec '_chromosomes_RSRC|@@'_chromosomes_VER@@' --developmentalStage '' Subcellular proteomics of T. cruzi reservosomes provided by Igor C. Almeida, Department of Biological Sciences, The Border Biomedical Research Center, University of Texas at El Paso, and Narcisa Cunha-e-Silva, Laboratório de Ultraestrutura Celular Hertha Meyer, Instituto de Biofísica Carlos Chagas Filho, Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. --DbRefMappingFile @@dataDir@@/Tcruzi_names_mapped.txt --extDbName %RESOURCE_NAME% --extDbReleaseNumber %RESOURCE_VERSION% --columnSpec "primary_identifier" --tableName "DbRefNASequence" T.cruzi mappings of older genome ids to the newer ones. --DBRefMappingFile @downloadDir@/TcSNP_dbxrefs.txt --extDbName %EXT_DB_NAME% --extDbReleaseNumber %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --columnSpec "primary_identifier,remark" --idURL "http://snps.tcruzi.org/genes/alignment?assembly_id=" --tableName DbRefNAFeature TcSNP is an online resource/database with information on genetic variation(polymorphisms,mutations) for different stocks,strains and isolates of Trypanosoma cruzi, the causative agent of Chagas diseases. --dbRefExternalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" PFGRC Trypanosoma cruzi Oligonucleotide Array v1 --dbRefExternalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" Transcriptome analysis of the Trypanosoma cruzi life-cycle Data provided by Rick Tarleton. Contact: tarleton@cb.uga.edu
